name: Piano Ball - Music Tap Game
description:
Give your beat to the ball and deep into music.

Welcome to the BallBeat, where you can relax and deep yourself into the music.
Introducing a chill and relax game just right for you and should you have a good feel of music you will be going far.

Let the music in you, lead your taps and finish the whole song, and the whole list.

Try to get "Perfect" or "Good" cause you dont wanna be dead when the screen is filled!

***Future Feature
- IpX Support
- More happy music
